org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class AbstractImageCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AbstractImageCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JPEGCodec, PNGCodec

    public abstract class AbstractImageCodec
extends java.lang.Object
implements Codec
    This is an abstract codec for saving automata as images.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

      • getFormat

        public abstract java.lang.String getFormat()
        Returns the informal format name of the image. The name must be one of the names returned by ImageIO.getWriterFormatNames().

        the informal format name of the image
